channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Details in the Trump Shooting Attempt, and Sean Combs Arrested
item.description: Plus, the boom in Ozempic dupes.

item.title: Israel’s Netanyahu Considers Firing Defense Minister Gallant in Government Shakeup
item.description: Dismissing the minister, Yoav Gallant, would remove a prominent voice of disagreement with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

item.title: Volkswagen, Germany’s largest private employer, could cut over 15,000 jobs with plant closures—and there’s no plan B, Jefferies says
item.description: Jefferies analyst said that Volkswagen's unions "can only strike on pay, not plant closure or layoffs if the latter are not contractually protected.”

item.title: Suspect in Apparent Trump Assassination Plot Crusaded for Many Causes
item.description: Interviews, records and a self-aggrandizing book suggest that Ryan Routh, a peripatetic builder, saw himself as an influential participant in momentou...

item.title: Dominique Pelicot, Husband on Trial for Drugging and Raping Wife, Testifies
item.description: Dominique Pelicot, who is accused of inviting strangers to rape his wife while she was drugged and unconscious, took the stand for the first time.

item.title: China controls 70% of the world’s critical rare earth minerals. Finding an alternative is proving tough—and expensive
item.description: The U.S. and its allies are trying to find new sources of rare earth metals, used in phones and fighter jets, outside of China.

item.title: Dominique Pelicot, Husband on Trial for Drugging and Raping Wife, Testifies
item.description: Dominique Pelicot, who is accused of inviting strangers to rape his wife while she was drugged and unconscious, took the stand for the first time.

item.title: Ukraine-Russia War Updates: Moscow Hits Back in Kursk as Air War Heats Up
item.description: Moscow’s troops have retaken a few villages in a border area that Kyiv’s forces invaded last month and are also advancing steadily in eastern Ukraine.

item.title: Almost a century after Virginia Woolf’s ‘A Room of One’s Own’ essay, women are driving the housing market
item.description: Woolf would be pleasantly surprised that today, women having a whole house of their own is not only commonplace but a key driver of the housing market...

item.title: Ukraine-Russia War Updates: Moscow Hits Back in Kursk as Air War Heats Up
item.description: Moscow’s troops have retaken a few villages in a border area that Kyiv’s forces invaded last month and are also advancing steadily in eastern Ukraine.

item.title: Hamas Plans Future in Gaza After Surviving Israel’s Onslaught
item.description: Khaled Meshal, one of Hamas’s most senior officials, said in an interview that the militant group expects to play a decisive role in the enclave when ...

item.title: Pizza Hut will put your résumé on a pizza box to help you get a job
item.description: That’s one way to stand out.

item.title: What Fed Interest Rate Cuts Means for Mortgages, Car Loans and More
item.description: Here’s what lowered interest rates will mean for your car loans, credit cards, mortgages, savings and student loans.

item.title: Meta Plans to Ban the Russian TV Network RT
item.description: The Facebook and Instagram owner said it would bar Russian media outlets including RT, which the U.S. has accused of acting as an intelligence arm.

item.title: Massive Houston pipeline fire was caused by an SUV that struck a natural gas valve and was incinerated
item.description: Deer Park officials said police and local FBI agents initiated investigations and found no preliminary reports that would suggest a coordinated or “te...
